title: MAFIA [game for PC] iso x 3
description:
MAFIA.
Game for PC.
Copied CD-ROM x 3 to iso.
No serial or fixes required.
Labelled:- illusion Software/Atherino Developer.
Patches available to download at their website to improve game performance.

Requirements.
98/2000/XP.
1.8GB hard disk space.
500MHz CPU.
96MB RAM.

Delivered in rar folder contains...
3 iso files [mdf/mds].
1 text document with my email address and a link to download Daemon Tools.
1 short avi video on how to install the game with Daemon Tools.

Extract the files from the rar folder and mount them with Daemon Tools virtual machine.

Get an extractor from the link below, recommend 7Zip, also download Daemon Tools as well from the link. <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>

Once 7Zip is installed, simply right click the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.
